title: FixIt Campus: Classroom & Facility Issue Reporter
description: A comprehensive campus maintenance system that streamlines the reporting and tracking of classroom and facility issues, enabling efficient communication between students, faculty, and maintenance staff.
subtitle: Empowering Campus Communities to Report and Resolve Facility Issues

backgroundImage.alt: Modern campus facility with maintenance concept

features.title: Photo-Based Issue Reporting
features.description: Report facility issues instantly with photo evidence. Capture broken chairs, faulty projectors, or Wi-Fi problems with detailed descriptions and visual documentation.

features.title: Real-Time Status Tracking
features.description: Monitor your reported issues from submission to completion. Track status updates through the entire workflow: submitted → in review → in progress → fixed.

features.title: Admin Dashboard for Maintenance
features.description: Comprehensive dashboard for maintenance staff to manage, prioritize, and resolve facility issues. Assign tasks, update statuses, and generate maintenance reports.

features.title: Issue Categorization
features.description: Organize reports by categories: furniture damage, network connectivity, audio-visual equipment, electrical issues, and more for efficient maintenance routing.

author: FixIt Campus Development Team
